mutants.code:
import re

def find_palindromes(text):
    num_list = re.findall('', text)
    palindromes = [num for num in num_list if num == num[::-1]]
    return palindromes

mutants.code:
import re

def find_palindromes(text):
    num_list = re.findall('\\d+', text)
    palindromes = [num for num in num_list if num != num[::-1]]
    return palindromes

mutants.mutated_line: palindromes = [num for num in num_list if num == num[::+1]]
